info.pascalkrause.vertx.datacollector.service

Interface DataCollectorService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DataCollectorServiceClient, DataCollectorServiceImpl, DataCollectorServiceVertxEBProxy

    public interface DataCollectorService

    • Field Detail

      • ERROR_QUEUE_LIMIT_REACHED

        static final java.lang.String ERROR_QUEUE_LIMIT_REACHED
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • performCollectionAndGetResult

        void performCollectionAndGetResult(java.lang.String requestId,
                                   io.vertx.core.json.JsonObject feature,
                                   io.vertx.core.Handler<io.vertx.core.AsyncResult<CollectorJobResult>> resultHandler)
        This method triggers a CollectorJob and receives the CollectorJobResult in the passed result handler. If the queue of the DataCollectorServiceVerticle is already full, the response will be a failed AsyncResult with the message which is speified in ERROR_QUEUE_LIMIT_REACHED.
        Parameters:
        requestId - A request id to identify the collection request.
        feature - A JSON object to pass attributes and properties which are needed for the collection process.
        resultHandler - A handler to process the result.

      • performCollection

        void performCollection(java.lang.String requestId,
                       io.vertx.core.json.JsonObject feature,
                       io.vertx.core.Handler<io.vertx.core.AsyncResult<java.lang.Void>> resultHandler)
        This method is doing the same as performCollectionAndGetResult(String, JsonObject, Handler), but will not send back the result. It will just send back the information if the job succeeded or failed.
        Parameters:
        requestId - A request id to identify the collection request.
        feature - A JSON object to pass attributes and properties which are needed for the collection process.
        resultHandler - A handler to process the result.

      • getMetricsSnapshot

        void getMetricsSnapshot(io.vertx.core.Handler<io.vertx.core.AsyncResult<io.vertx.core.json.JsonObject>> resultHandler)
        Returns a JsonObject which contains a current snapshot of the metrics. The JsonObject has more or less the following structure: 
         {
   total: {
     jobs: {
       count: 123,
       failed: 12,
       succeeded: 108,
       exception: 3
     },
     quality: {
       complete: 90,
       partial: 20,
       ....
     },
     errors: {
       blocked: 90,
       timeout: 20,
       ....
     }
   },
   queue: {
     maxSize: 30,
     free: 12,
     occupied: 18
   }
 }

        Parameters:
        resultHandler - A handler to process the metrics result.

      • close

        void close()
        Is needed for the proxy generation
